message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SE

The paper discusses the challenges of securing and anonymizing IoT transactions, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI). The paper also discusses the potential of blockchain technology, which falls under the category of distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC) and data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). Finally, the paper discusses the need for adapting blockchain algorithms to the constraints of IoT devices, which falls under the category of software engineering (cs.SE).
